name: Reacolor
description:
A simple but highly replayable game, in which you have to improve your own highscores in various gamemodes and test different skills of yours (reaction time, memory, accuracy, etc.).

You can also customize essential attributes of the game - Inner Eye, Outer Eye, Buttons and Themes - using your accumulated in-game currency.
Challenge your friends and see which one of you is more skillful!

Game is currently in a very early state, your feedback is very important!
